short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utility to monitor the availability of products at E-Commerce Stores

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is to make user aware about the `out of stock` products as soon as they are available for purchase. As of now it supports Amazon, Flipkart & BigBasket. You will not miss to purchase products saved in your cart anymore.

Helpful Guide/README to use extension: https://tarunmaini16.github.io/upalabdh.html
